definition: disciple/apprentice/believer/on foot/bare or empty/to no avail/only/prison sentence

sentences.english: Pray for the government to halt its campaign of targeting Christians .
sentences.chinese: 祷告政府会停止以基督徒为箭靶的活动。

sentences.english: Christian dedication and faithfulness in worshiping, studying the Word, receiving the sacrament.
sentences.chinese: 在做礼拜，学习圣经，领圣餐时基督徒的奉献和忠诚。

sentences.english: Christians believe Jesus Christ was buried where the Church of the Holy Sepulchre now stands in Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 基督徒们相信耶稣基督就是被葬在了这座圣墓教堂下。

sentences.english: Wow he send weapons to the enemy who beheads Christians.
sentences.chinese: 哇他竟然给斩杀基督徒的敌人运送武器。

sentences.english: At the same time, Christians in waiting for an opportunity outside Granada.
sentences.chinese: 而与此同时，基督徒在格拉纳达以外等待时机。

sentences.english: We ought not to need the exhortation: it should be our constant habit all the day and every day.
sentences.chinese: 这应该是基督徒每日的习惯，无需特别耳提面命。

sentences.english: Professor: Why we think Rome was persecuting Christians?
sentences.chinese: 为什么我们会认为罗马在迫害基督徒？

sentences.english: Christian should not break the Sabbath.
Mr. Wai-chung LO is a christian teacher.
sentences.chinese: 卢维中老师是一位基督徒老师。

sentences.english: There wouldn't be Christians if everyone was considered Christians.
sentences.chinese: 如果每个人都是基督徒，就不会有基督徒了。

sentences.english: There wouldn't be Christians if everyone was considered Christians.
sentences.chinese: 如果每个人都是基督徒，就不会有基督徒了。

sentences.english: Paul wants Christians to be governed by common sense that looks out for their fellow brother or sister.
sentences.chinese: 保罗要基督徒凭着常识为他们团契的弟兄姐妹着想。

sentences.english: And the disciples were called Christians first in Antioch.
sentences.chinese: 门徒称为基督徒，是从安提阿起首。

sentences.english: My grandmamma told me when she was born she was a Christian.
sentences.chinese: 我的奶奶告诉我，她从小就是基督徒。

sentences.english: Christians believe that Emanuel is the prophet Isaiah's prophecy of the Messiah.
sentences.chinese: 基督徒相信以马内利就是先知以赛亚所预言的弥赛亚。

sentences.english: A Christian without a small group is an orphan.
sentences.chinese: 一个没有小组的基督徒就是一个孤儿。

definition: God (in Catholicism)/abbr. for 天主教[Tian1 zhu3 jiao4], Catholicism
